collection.title: Glass Baby Bottles
collection.body_html: Discover the pure and sustainable choice for your baby's feeding journey. Our curated collection of glass baby bottles are crafted from thermal-shock resistant borosilicate glass, ensuring they are safe, durable, and easy to clean. Free from the chemicals sometimes found in plastic, glass offers ultimate peace of mind. Shop our range of ergonomic and stylish glass bottles from leading brands.

products.title: Durable Glass Feeding Bottle | Easy-to-Clean Infant Bottle
products.body_html:
Feeding a baby can be one of the most rewarding yet challenging tasks for parents, especially when the wrong bottle complicates things. Leaks, plastic odors, or bottles that don't preserve milk quality can quickly turn a calm feeding session into frustration. The Baby Glass Bottle solves these struggles with a premium, safe, and durable design that keeps every meal fresh and stress-free.

Unlike traditional plastic bottles, the Baby Glass Bottle offers long-lasting performance with a pure, hygienic build. It's resistant to stains, odors, and wear, making it a practical choice for parents who want to give their babies the best. Whether at home or on the go, this bottle ensures your little one gets milk in the safest, cleanest way possible.

 


WHAT MAKES THE BABY GLASS BOTTLE DIFFERENT


✅ PREMIUM GLASS BUILD—Made from high-quality, heat-resistant glass that lasts longer than plastic bottles. Parents can trust that every feed is free from harmful chemicals and odors.

✅ ANTI-COLIC NIPPLE – Designed with a vent system that reduces swallowed air, easing discomfort and gas. This helps babies stay calmer during and after feedings.


✅ EASY TO CLEAN – The wide opening and glass construction make sterilizing thorough and straightforward. Parents save time while ensuring the Baby Glass Bottle is always hygienic.

✅ SAFE TEMPERATURE HANDLING—It withstands hot and cold liquids without warping. Families can confidently warm or cool milk, knowing the Baby Glass Bottle keeps it safe.




✅ NATURAL FEEDING EXPERIENCE – The nipple design mimics breastfeeding, making transitions smoother. Babies feed more naturally, reducing fussiness and rejection.



SIMPLE TO USE BABY GLASS BOTTLE

1. Fill the Baby Glass Bottle with milk or formula.

2. Secure the anti-colic nipple and leak-proof cap.

3. Feed your baby comfortably at home or outside.

4. Sterilize and reuse without worrying about damage or wear.


Recent surveys show that over 70% of parents experience frustrations with bottle feeding, including leaks, lingering odors, and babies refusing bottles. These issues waste time, formula, energy, and unnerve parents and babies.

Families using the Baby Glass Bottle enjoy fewer feeding issues, cleaner and fresher meals, and a smoother overall experience. Its durable glass build, natural nipple, and safety-focused features make it a trusted choice for parents who want to simplify feeding and give their babies the comfort they deserve.



PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Glass

Capacity: 150ml and 240ml

Caliber: Wide caliber

Shape: Arc

Colors: Blue, Pink

Package Size: 240 x 100 x 100 mm

 

 

A Nestacular Promise

At Nestacular, we believe in the quality of our products, so we offer a 30-day Money-Back Guarantee, no questions asked! When you purchase from us, there is ZERO Risk for you!

Congratulations!

products.title: LittleWinks Baby Bottle Brush Set – 2-Piece Nipple & Glass Bottle Cleaner
products.body_html:
The LittleWinks Baby Bottle Brush Set is designed to make cleaning your baby’s feeding essentials quick, hygienic, and hassle-free. This 2-piece set includes a durable glass bottle cleaning brush and a soft nipple brush, ensuring every corner of the bottle is spotless.

Made from food-grade, BPA-free materials, the brushes are safe, non-toxic, and gentle on bottles while being tough on milk residue and stains. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, making cleaning effortless.

Compact and lightweight, the LittleWinks Brush Set is perfect for both home and travel, keeping your baby’s bottles hygienic at all times.

Key Features:

  • 2-Piece Brush Set: Includes bottle brush and nipple cleaner.

  • Safe & BPA-Free: Made from food-grade, non-toxic materials.

  • Efficient Cleaning: Removes milk residue and tough stains easily.

  • Ergonomic Handle: Comfortable grip for effortless cleaning.

  • Travel-Friendly: Compact design for home or on-the-go use.

Keep your baby’s feeding essentials clean and safe with the LittleWinks Baby Bottle Brush Set.

products.title: Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle – Thermostatic Milk Storage & Feeding Bottle
products.body_html:
The Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle is the perfect blend of safety, durability, and smart feeding design. Made from high-quality borosilicate glass, this bottle ensures safe milk storage and long-lasting use, even under high temperatures.

With its thermostatic function, the Nibby bottle helps maintain the right milk temperature, making feeding time more convenient for parents and comfortable for babies. Its anti-colic nipple mimics natural breastfeeding to reduce gas, spit-up, and fussiness.

Lightweight, portable, and easy to clean, this glass baby bottle is ideal for home use or travel, giving parents peace of mind and infants a safe, natural feeding experience.

Key Features:

  • Premium Glass Material: Durable, heat-resistant borosilicate glass.

  • Thermostatic Storage: Maintains milk at a safe, warm temperature.

  • Anti-Colic Nipple: Natural breastfeeding feel to reduce discomfort.

  • Portable Design: Easy to carry for travel and on-the-go feeding.

  • Safe & Hygienic: BPA-free and easy to sterilize.

Choose the Nibby Portable Glass Baby Bottle for safe, stress-free, and natural feeding every day.

products.title: SnugNest Drop-Resistant Glass Baby Bottle – Straw Water & Milk Feeder for Newborns and Toddlers
products.body_html:
The SnugNest Drop-Resistant Glass Baby Bottle is specially designed for safe and stress-free feeding. Made from premium borosilicate glass, it offers superior durability while resisting drops and temperature changes. Perfect for both milk and water feeding, this bottle ensures your baby’s comfort and safety.

Equipped with a soft straw nipple, it mimics natural breastfeeding and makes sipping easier for newborns and toddlers. Its anti-colic design reduces gas, spit-up, and fussiness, while the ergonomic shape allows little hands to hold it with ease.

Easy to clean, hygienic, and built to last, the SnugNest glass baby bottle is an excellent choice for parents looking for a safe, eco-friendly, and reliable feeding solution.

Key Features:

  • Drop-Resistant Glass: Durable, heat-resistant borosilicate material.

  • Straw Nipple Design: Comfortable feeding for newborns & toddlers.

  • Anti-Colic System: Prevents gas and feeding discomfort.

  • Multi-Use Feeder: Suitable for both milk and water.

  • Safe & Easy to Clean: BPA-free, eco-friendly, and hygienic.

Give your little one safe and natural feeding with the SnugNest Drop-Resistant Glass Baby Bottle.

products.title: Sunbeam Tots Borosilicate Glass Baby Bottle – Safe Feeding for Infants & Toddlers
products.body_html:
Ensure safe and healthy feeding with the Sunbeam Tots Borosilicate Glass Baby Bottle, perfect for infants and toddlers. Made from durable, high-quality borosilicate glass, this bottle resists breakage and thermal shock, making it safe for both warm and cold liquids.

The wide-neck design allows easy filling, cleaning, and mixing of formula or milk. Its BPA-free silicone nipple ensures a smooth feeding experience, mimicking natural breastfeeding to provide comfort and safety for your little one. Ideal for home or travel, the Sunbeam Tots Glass Bottle combines practicality, hygiene, and durability.

Key Features:

  • Borosilicate Glass: Durable, break-resistant, and safe for hot or cold liquids.

  • BPA-Free Silicone Nipple: Gentle and comfortable for infants.

  • Wide-Neck Design: Easy to fill, clean, and mix formula.

  • Safe for Infants & Toddlers: Suitable for different feeding stages.

  • Eco-Friendly & Reusable: Sustainable and long-lasting feeding solution.

Feed your baby safely and comfortably with the Sunbeam Tots Borosilicate Glass Baby Bottle.
